data.text:
I plan to race with Teio soon, 
and when that time comes…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I plan to race with Teio soon, 
<story>and when that time comes…

data.text:
I would like you to come and see for 
yourself… Moreover, I would like you 
to watch over her afterwards.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I would like you to come and see for 
<story>yourself… Moreover, I would like you 
<story>to watch over her afterwards.

data.text:
Just as she had said, a few days later the race 
between Symboli Rudolf and Tokai Teio began…
data.processed:
<story>Just as she had said, a few days later the race 
<story>between Symboli Rudolf and Tokai Teio began…

data.text:
The stands were filled to the brim, the 
entire crowd in an uproar. Both of them 
are amazing in their own right, so seeing 
them race against one another…
data.processed:
<story>The stands were filled to the brim, the 
<story>entire crowd in an uproar. Both of them 
<story>are amazing in their own right, so seeing 
<story>them race against one another…

data.text:
Woah! There's so many people here. 
It's almost like the Twinkle Series!! 
Ahaha, everyone's so excited!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Woah! There's so many people here. 
<story>It's almost like the Twinkle Series!! 
<story>Ahaha, everyone's so excited!!

data.text: Wait! Hey, so you actually came!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Wait! Hey, so you actually came!

data.text:
Tsk tsk tsk. You do know that I am 
the Great Teio, right? So of course 
I feel great! I'll easily win this 
and have all the praise to myself!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Tsk tsk tsk. You do know that I am 
<story>the Great Teio, right? So of course 
<story>I feel great! I'll easily win this 
<story>and have all the praise to myself!

data.text: Wait… Today I'm against Prez… and I'm…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Wait… Today I'm against Prez… and I'm…

data.text: I'm against her…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>I'm against her…

data.text: Huh?! Ah, umm… Nope!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Huh?! Ah, umm… Nope!

data.text: A-Anyways… I have to get ready! See you later!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>A-Anyways… I have to get ready! See you later!

data.text:
And so, as the crowds roars echoed throughout 
the stadium, the race began.
data.processed:
<story>And so, as the crowds roars echoed throughout 
<story>the stadium, the race began.

data.text: Alright, I'll overtake you super quick!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Alright, I'll overtake you super quick!!

data.text:
Halfway through the race, Tokai Teio attempted 
to overtake Symboli Rudolf. However…
data.processed:
<story>Halfway through the race, Tokai Teio attempted 
<story>to overtake Symboli Rudolf. However…

data.text: I won't let you…!
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>I won't let you…!

data.text: Huh?! The distance between us is growing!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Huh?! The distance between us is growing!

data.text:
Nngh! We're already on the final stretch! But… I 
can still fight!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Nngh! We're already on the final stretch! But… I 
<story>can still fight!!

data.text: I said I wouldn't let you, didn't I?!
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>I said I wouldn't let you, didn't I?!

data.text: Uwaah!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Uwaah!!

data.text:
Symboli Rudolf dominated the race from start to 
finish, beating Tokai Teio with a huge amount of 
distance to spare.
data.processed:
<story>Symboli Rudolf dominated the race from start to 
<story>finish, beating Tokai Teio with a huge amount of 
<story>distance to spare.

data.text: I lost!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>I lost!!

data.text: But as I thought, Prez is amazi—
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>But as I thought, Prez is amazi—

data.text: Whooo!!
data.processed: <story>Whooo!!

data.text: Eek!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Eek!

data.text:
President Rudolf, you were amazing… 
Absolutely spectacular!!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>President Rudolf, you were amazing… 
<story>Absolutely spectacular!!

data.text:
Teio was known as such an amazing racer, yet you 
beat her in such a clean manner. You really are 
the strongest ever!!
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Teio was known as such an amazing racer, yet you 
<story>beat her in such a clean manner. You really are 
<story>the strongest ever!!

data.text: President! President! President!!
data.name: Horsegirls
data.processed: <story>President! President! President!!

data.text: I appreciate everyone's support.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>I appreciate everyone's support.

data.text:
They're cheering so hard for her… They're all 
staring at her…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>They're cheering so hard for her… They're all 
<story>staring at her…

data.text: They're… only looking at her…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>They're… only looking at her…

data.text: Huh? Oh…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Huh? Oh…

data.text: Of course I am! Don't… worry about it…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Of course I am! Don't… worry about it…

data.text:
With the cheers behind her, Tokai 
Teio ran from the stadium.
data.processed:
<story>With the cheers behind her, Tokai 
<story>Teio ran from the stadium.

data.text:
I wouldn't see her again until later that night. 
It was at a park near the academy.
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't see her again until later that night. 
<story>It was at a park near the academy.

choices.text: What're you doing out so late?
What're you doing out so late?

data.text:
Oh, it's you… well I don't really feel like 
talking right now.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Oh, it's you… well I don't really feel like 
<story>talking right now.

data.text: Later! Nngh?!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Later! Nngh?!

data.text:
As I rushed over, I noticed that her legs were 
shaking violently. She's definitely pushing 
herself too hard.
data.processed:
<story>As I rushed over, I noticed that her legs were 
<story>shaking violently. She's definitely pushing 
<story>herself too hard.

data.text:
Hmph… It's nothing, okay? I'm going to continue 
training, so go away!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: I can't allow you to push yourself any further!
choices.processed: <size=36>I can't allow you to push yourself any further!</size>

choices.text: I can't allow you to push yourself any further!
choices.processed: <size=36>I can't allow you to push yourself any further!</size>

data.processed:
<story>Hmph… It's nothing, okay? I'm going to continue 
<story>training, so go away!

data.text: Shut up, stop acting like you know it all!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Shut up, stop acting like you know it all!

data.text:
Go away! You're not even my trainer, 
so don't lecture me!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Go away! You're not even my trainer, 
<story>so don't lecture me!!

data.text: Nngh… Wh-What's with you?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Nngh… Wh-What's with you?

data.text: Sniffle… What's with you… You're scaring me…!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Sniffle… What's with you… You're scaring me…!

data.text:
I sat by Tokai Teio's side, trying 
to soothe her as she cried…
data.processed:
<story>I sat by Tokai Teio's side, trying 
<story>to soothe her as she cried…

choices.text: Are you feeling a little better?
Are you feeling a little better?

data.text: Yeah… But… I still don't get it.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Yeah… But… I still don't get it.

data.text:
My chest… It's been hurting ever since I lost 
the race today.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>My chest… It's been hurting ever since I lost 
<story>the race today.

data.text: Seeing Prez have all the limelight and cheers…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Seeing Prez have all the limelight and cheers…

data.text:
I'm strange, aren't I? You know, 
I've always idolized Prez.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I'm strange, aren't I? You know, 
<story>I've always idolized Prez.

data.text:
She's the strongest, the fastest, and the most 
amazing Uma Musume. And because of that, she's 
always praised by everyone.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>She's the strongest, the fastest, and the most 
<story>amazing Uma Musume. And because of that, she's 
<story>always praised by everyone.

data.text: She's exactly what I want to become.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>She's exactly what I want to become.

data.text:
She wins every race. She meets the crowd's 
cheers with a smile. She's just so cool!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>She wins every race. She meets the crowd's 
<story>cheers with a smile. She's just so cool!!

data.text: So… why…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>So… why…

data.text:
I've seen her being cheered on so many times 
before, so why was today any different…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I've seen her being cheered on so many times 
<story>before, so why was today any different…

data.text:
Why am I like this… Why do I only feel better if 
I run like a maniac…?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Why am I like this… Why do I only feel better if 
<story>I run like a maniac…?

data.text:
It seems like Tokai Teio realized something 
important on that day.
data.processed:
<story>It seems like Tokai Teio realized something 
<story>important on that day.

data.text:
With that in mind, I took 
her back to her dormitory.
data.processed:
<story>With that in mind, I took 
<story>her back to her dormitory.
